Post Title: Modern Studio in Boyle Heights, Newly Renovated
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Ask about our Move-in Specials!!

2025 E 4th Street is a 24-unit apartment building located in the Boyle Heights sub-market, one of the most vibrant, historical and walkable neighborhoods in Los Angeles; known for its extensive art, culturally rich cuisine, and central location. Located directly across from Hollenbeck Park these newly state-of-the-art renovated apartments are yours to call home.

The units are freshly painted throughout and have brand new floors, recessed lighting, and ceiling fans. Each unit has a large walk-in closet and newly installed blinds. The kitchen has brand new countertops, cabinets, stainless steel stove, fridge, and nice fixtures. The bathrooms are brand new and clean with large white marble tile! There is laundry on-site and street parking only.

Our professional leasing staff is ready to help match you with your perfect home.

You are welcome to tour the property and unit during our open house hours every Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Saturday from 5:00pm-6:00pm.

Please contact our friendly property manager Federico at show contact info with any questions or to coordinate a time to see the apartment in case the open house times don’t work for your busy schedule and we will do our best to accommodate you! Thursday and Friday viewings are by appointment only.

APPLY TODAY online at http://rentyourhome.weebly.com.

Features

Fully furnished
Linens & towels included
32" Flat Screen TV, Cable TV, Internet, All utilities are included
Refrigerator and microwave included
Onsite manager
Walk to restaurants, apparel shops, & more
Metro Light Rail Soto Station one block away!
Nearby parks
Nearby schools
Urban feel / city views
Minutes to Downtown LA & Arts District!
Plenty of public transit, no need to drive!
Newly remodeled kitchen!

ABOUT 150 N Soto Street Property

Our location is in the heart of Boyle Heights, a neighborhood just East of Downtown LA (just over one mile to the Arts District across the LA River). The lifestyle here is very rich in urban amenities styling itself after it's Brooklyn namesake. The street is very walk-able with an eclectic and vibrant mix of locally owned retail shops and restaurants in abundance. Get serenaded by live Mariachi music while sipping a Horchata from locally owned restaurants on the street!

This apartment is all inclusive and fully furnished and all utilities are paid for by the owner. Units have laminate flooring, vertical blinds, ceiling fan, new fridge and microwave, queen sized bed, and are freshly painted. Common area kitchen is located on each floor and is available for everybody to use.

Well served by public transportation: Walk 2 minutes to Soto light rail station straight to Arts District, Little Tokyo, or no time to catch a bus to DTLA. It is incredibly easy to get around this town!

Approval is based on income (must show proof of income at least twice the monthly rent), rental history, criminal background (no felonies), & NO evictions. Credit scores are not as important as these other factors in evaluating applications. Please apply today!

Highlights

  • Boyle Heights Neighborhood
  • Nostalgic Building
  • Easy Access to Metro Gold Line and Freeways
  • Minutes from Downtown Los Angeles
  • Between future housing projects at 1st and Soto and 1st and Evergreen
  • 7 Door Built-In Refrigerator and Approx. 1,500 sq. ft of sales floor space.

Description

Prime Boyle Heights (East Los Angeles) location on East 1st Street. Suitable and configured for a Grocery Convenience Store. Lease type and terms negotiable. Space has been rehabbed and needs a reliable Business Store Owner Manager to operate. Built in refrigerator has 7 Doors and measures 21' x 8'. Must see to appreciate. Boyle Heights residents have been asking for the grand opening and looking for a local store to provide quality foods and service. Also, many are looking for employement. Approx 1,500 sq. ft of sales floor space. No lock-box on premise, schedule an appointment. Serious Lessee's Only with spotless financials.

In Boyle Heights on the corner of East 1st Street and Mathews Street 1/2 a block away from Soto and 1st Street Metro Gold Line Station and minutes from Downtown Los Angeles.

Community gentrification happening along 1st Street corridor along Metro Gold Line Route.

Between future housing projects at 1st and Soto and 1st and Evergreen.

Post Title: $400 FURNISHED BEDROOM IN A XL 3 BED/2 BATH AVAIL IMMEDIATEL
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Seeking a potential long term new roomate to share my home with. Current roomate will be leaving . I keep to myself alot and would be nice to find someone who is similar. Ideally I would like to have a hard working clean and respectful roomate willing to share household duties etc.. I am a pretty chill easy going guy, I smoke weed and enjoy a good drink and all outdoor things.. have a big garden and lots of house plants. There is some storage space but not alot so its best if you dont have too many loose odds and ends. The basement space is unfurnished and is a pretty sweet space for you to set up and decorate as you like. I am in the middle of repainting the whole house as well so hope you like the colors.Contact here show contact info
Pets are a pssibility so long as you are a responsible owner. I have compost and garden beds in the back so any dogs will have to be well behaved and not let out unattended.
Laundry is in the basement bathroom so to a degree the space is somewhat shared for laundry usage.
That covers most of it. If your interested shoot me a message and we can see of we connect well and then proceed from there. I am having trouble loading pictures but will get som up soon.

Post Title: 2 Bedroom 2 Bath in LA with Wood Style Floors + Recessed Lighting
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Unit Availability : June 05, 2021


Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Bright Top Level 1 Bedroom Apartment with BONUS Room/HOME Office, Private Washer & Dryer | Parking | Shared Patio

5237 Eagledale #B, Los Angeles CA 90041

Come and live in this bright top level unit located at a triplex tucked away from the street. The unit is bright with many windows throughout and it will definitely brighten your living with wonderful park views and modern comfort. In addition to the bedroom, there is a bonus room ideal for an office, library, etc. plus you'll have your own private complimentary washer and dryer. Yes - the laundry is not coin operated and it's free. Did I mention that the unit comes with an assigned parking spot? How convenient!

This unit comes complete with newer kitchen appliances such as a stove and fridge and the place was remodeled couple years ago with newer hardwood flooring (pergo), newer bathroom vanity, two wall ACs and wall heater. The bedroom overlooks the chill Carr park - providing you with peaceful and beautiful views.

WAIT. It gets better. Located super close to Colorado Blvd where many trendy and hip restaurants and cafes are located. For instance: Swork, The Oinkster, Lemongrass. Also, the Americana, large shopping and entertainment complex, and Occidental college are few minutes away. Eat, shop, local hang outs - right around the corner. And super close to Highland Park, Pasadena, Downtown, Echo Park and Los Feliz.

Don't let it go, come prepared with your application to make it as your next home.

Post Title: $400 FURNISHED BEDROOM IN A XL 3 BED/2 BATH AVAIL IMMEDIATEL
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Seeking a potential long term new roomate to share my home with. Current roomate will be leaving . I keep to myself alot and would be nice to find someone who is similar. Ideally I would like to have a hard working clean and respectful roomate willing to share household duties etc.. I am a pretty chill easy going guy, I smoke weed and enjoy a good drink and all outdoor things.. have a big garden and lots of house plants. There is some storage space but not alot so its best if you dont have too many loose odds and ends. The basement space is unfurnished and is a pretty sweet space for you to set up and decorate as you like. I am in the middle of repainting the whole house as well so hope you like the colors.Contact here show contact info
Pets are a pssibility so long as you are a responsible owner. I have compost and garden beds in the back so any dogs will have to be well behaved and not let out unattended.
Laundry is in the basement bathroom so to a degree the space is somewhat shared for laundry usage.
That covers most of it. If your interested shoot me a message and we can see of we connect well and then proceed from there. I am having trouble loading pictures but will get som up soon.

Post Title: Private Bathroom & Furnished, near HIP Arts District
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

We have one private bedroom with a private bath available in a 3 bedroom house in Boyle Heights (this bedroom is furnished, although design has changed). Roommates names are Josh and Pedram. Mid's 20. College educated and creative. One of us is from North Carolina and the other roomie is a military veteran.

The place isn't glam, but its a great place to live and have your own private bathroom.

Near all the major freeways: 5, 10, 60, 101, and 110. DTLA and Arts District is just a short 5–10 minute drive (it's not a bad walk or bike ride either). Accessible to lots of bus routes that have stops on Soto or Chavez Blvd. The Gold Line Soto rail station is near.

This room is currently on a month-to-month term. Rent is $850 due on the first of each month plus share the utilities (water, sewer, electric, trash) that's about an additional $70.

Please contact me (Jess) if you are interested so we can arrange to show you the place and/or answer any questions you may have first. It would also be helpful if you tell us a little about yourself!

Description:

This Old World styled Italian built Duplex sits at the rear of a Large Lot. There is a Shared Front Yard perfect for gardening. There is a Shared Driveway for 3 cars.

We prefer a non-smoker willing to sign a one year lease.

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

This is the perfect location in the center of it ALL! Enjoy the variety of shops and cafes in the Village and Sunset Junction not to mention the local theaters like the Vista and Los Feliz! Owner pays for water. 1 parking space can be rented for $2 monthly. Additional parking space can be rented for $50 monthly based on availability. Sorry, no pets. Available for immediate movein.

Work in a central location, in Downtown Los Angeles, near all the major Freeways. This is a 4,000 SF, stand-alone, M2 zoned, private warehouse, with 15 foot high ceilings. Block built construction, insulated roof, and central AC in the offices. It features a gated parking yard in the back for 2± cars, and 3 striped private parking spaces in front. Property features a large open warehouse space, no columns, ( 3,200 SF ), 2 private restrooms, wet sink area, flat ceiling, not truss, secure fencing, double egress, high steel fences in the yard, 12-foot roll-up door, steel sliding gate, large curb cuts, and a dedicated power supply of 250 amps.  Perfect for creative space, retail, or light industrial. Post Title: Chill roommate wanted to share house with a view
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

PLEASE READ ENTIRE AD BEFORE CONTACTING ME. ROOM AVAILABLE JUNE 1ST.
Looking for a chill roommate to share my home in the hills of East LA (City Terrace).

Max: 1 person
Rent: $940/mo + $35/mo utilities
Wifi and laundry included
Semi-private bath (read details below)

SPECIAL: $150 off 1st month's rent.
MOVE-IN: June 1st

Are you a chill person looking for someone relaxed to share a home with? Looking for a central hub to all of LA? Look no further. My home is located very central to everything.

I have a great view, a new waterfall/pond and a great porch/zen garden to relax and enjoy the view. My home faces west so there are incredible sunsets all the time. I also have a nice BBQ area next to the pond. Check out my pictures.

Central to: DTLA, Alhambra, Boyle Heights, White Memorial & USC Keck Hospital
Fwys: 5, 10, 110, 101 & 710 fwys
Public trans: bus stop half block away & Gold line less than 1m away

INCLUDED IN RENT:

-You get a free parking space in the driveway (for 1 vehicle)
-Free wifi
-Free laundry in house
-Semi private bathroom (see details below)
-Use of main fridge PLUS a mini fridge in your room.
-New mini split heating and cooling system in your room with remote to set temp to your desired level (ultra quiet)
-Multi-drawer dresser shown in pictures will remain in your room for your use
(all other furniture in pics NOT included)

*You will need your own tv and computer for your room.

EXTRA DETAILS ABOUT YOUR ROOM:

-Bedroom has direct access to main bathroom - 75% of the time your bath will be your private bath (I have a half bath so I will only share your bath for shower/bath time and when there are guests in the house. There is a 2nd entrance to your bath from the hallway so no one will pass thru your room when using the bathroom).

NOTE: This is a no smoking house, low key, not a party house. Looking for someone responsible and courteous of each other's space and willing and able to clean after themselves.

ADDITIONAL NOTE: I have 1 cat & as of a couple weeks ago, a small dog as well (he wandered into my yard and decided this is his home). If you want to live with me, you must be a pet lover. My house is small though so I can't have any more pets but you are more than welcome to snuggle with mine. The dog in particular, loves being in people's laps all the time.


LEASE TERM = 6 months OR 1 year (then month to month)

Rent: $940/mo
Utilities: $35/mo
Wifi: included
Deposit: $940

SPECIAL: $150 off 1st month's rent

NEEDED FOR MOVE-IN:
-2 months of bank statements
-3 paystubs (no unemployment)
-First month’s rent + deposit (can split deposit over 1st two months)


IMPORTANT NOTE: To exclude scammers, if you text me please start your text by typing: "Soma2021!"

There are so many scammers out there these days so if you don't include this passcode, I won't respond. Thanks for understanding! I look forward to meeting you soon.

NOTE: I will not reply to requests that ask me to contact someone other than yourself.

THANKS AND HAPPY HUNTING! :)

QR Code Link to This Post

Not all apartment communities are created equal. To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on. First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without. Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable. So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?
When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind. Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over. You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living. Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake. Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more. And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.

Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home. If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high. Contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: Currie Hall (USC health sciences campus) room available
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This is one private room in a 3 bedroom space. The room has its own (big and clean!) bathroom with sink, two bathroom cabinets, toilet and fully functioning shower and tub. The bedroom is already furnished with a bed, desk (with desk chair) and nightstand. It also has its own walk-in closet.

The kitchen has an electric stove, a refrigerator with a freezer, a sink, a dishwasher and four high chairs (that come with the room). The living room right next to the kitchen has a large couch (also comes with the apartment) and a central table. There is also a balcony with a view that faces the pool. All of these would be shared with the other people living in the unit (usually up to 3 people).

Currently one female is living in one of the rooms in this unit. I would prefer a younger female for this unit.

This would be a sublet for two months (June and July). If you like living there and are staying in LA you can get rent for a year and it would be at the same price. Currently there is no security deposit, previously it was $500.

The building is on the USC health sciences campus between Lincoln Heights and Boyle Heights. It is about a 10 minute drive east to the nearest suburb, Alhambra. Pasadena is a 20 minute drive east. Downtown LA is about 10 minutes west. Griffith Park and Observatory are about 20 minutes north. Burbank is 30 minutes north.
Neighborhood: (USC health sciences campus, Los Angeles, CA)

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1101-- 24/7 Creative Office Space in DTLA***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Post Title: 453 S Spring St #222 - BEAUTIFUL CORNER Creative Office Space
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

SPACE WILL HAVE NEW LIGHTING! (not shown in photos)

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Cafe 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting.

This space has ONE HUGE ROOM plus 1 PRIVATE OFFICE, the bosses office per se :) This space is a CORNER UNIT facing 5th Street and has tons of WINDOWS flooding the space with NATURAL LIGHT! Custom curtains included! The unit also has a LARGE STORAGE CLOSET with shelving. Space will have FRESH WHITE PAINT! Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Get it before it’s gone! Ask us the advantages of signing a five-year lease! CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

Post Title: Bedroom For Rent in Large HOUSE
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

First off, we are not desperate to fill this room; we are just looking for the right fit for our home.

We have a BIG house (2,300sq ft) located less than 1 mile from USC-HSC campus and LA County hospital. Close to Downtown and the Arts District. Also 4 blocks from the Metro Gold Line. We are renting out 1 of the large (150sq ft) bedrooms for $900, plus utilities (about $70/month). Close to public transit and I-10, I-5, and 101. Down the street is the main stretch of businesses on Cesar Chavez such as: Guisados's, George's Burgers, Brooklyn Pizza, King Taco, Walgreens, a cool local book store and record store, and a delicious (and cheap) juice bar!

Our kitchen is large and spacious. Large front patio and back yard oasis with a pergola, firepit, and landscaping. Plenty of storage on site that you are free to use. Washer/dryer in the basement.

Ideal for a very clean and professional adult.
NO PETS please. NO subleasing. NOT a party house.
We do have our occasional get togethers and such in the back yard, but it is definitely not a regular thing. We are all rather quiet and respectful of others' time and space in the home.

Month to Month

You will need first month rent and deposit of $500 ($1,400 total to move in) and proof of income. If interested, send me an email!

Serious inquiries only.


About us:
4 professional males
2 work in the film industry, 1 in education, 1 chef

Ultimately, home is all about the details. For an apartment home to be unique, it needs more than just a reasonable amount of living space; it needs amenities that enrich your life, in a place that enhances your experiences. At Grandview Towers, those details are our priority.

As you explore your new apartment home, you'll notice a wide variety of thoughtful amenities. Look up and you'll see soaring vaulted ceilings, which create a feeling of space. Look down and you'll see immaculate hardwood and tile flooring. Run your hand along smooth granite countertops, and your eye can't help but wander to stainless steel appliances.

Just steps away lies our fitness center, providing plenty of opportunities to help sustain your busy lifestyle. Look a little further at immaculately kept landscaping, where you can mingle and meet new friends and old. Look further yet, and you'll see you're surrounded by the diverse and laid-back community of Westlake. Parks, restaurants, and museums are available, and you're less than two minutes from downtown Los Angeles.

Home is all about the details. If you're ready to take advantage of them, we're ready to have you. For more information about leasing, contact us online or by phone today.

Post Title: Room/Studio in Community Art Warehouse
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Room or studio space for rent in East LA ART COMMUNITY WAREHOUSE. Communal style living with private room but shared kitchen, bathrooms and living area. Room is spacious and freshly painted. Comes with small AC unit already installed. Cat and dog friendly as long as they get along with the current cats/dogs. Washing machine in building. Deposit is also $1050.

We will be asking for first month's rent and security deposit upon being approved to move in. We will need a reference from a previous landlord and we will need to make sure you are a good fit with the current roommates.

Because we are a community of artists, we are looking for creatives that are looking to further their artistic careers and be surrounded with like-minded individuals. Due to this environment being a work-live environment, it is not a great place for kids.

Thanks and can't wait to hear from you!

ABOUT 150 N Soto Street Property

Our location is in the heart of Boyle Heights, a neighborhood just East of Downtown LA (just over one mile to the Arts District across the LA River). The lifestyle here is very rich in urban amenities styling itself after it's Brooklyn namesake. The street is very walk-able with an eclectic and vibrant mix of locally owned retail shops and restaurants in abundance. Get serenaded by live Mariachi music while sipping a Horchata from locally owned restaurants on the street!

This apartment is all inclusive and fully furnished and all utilities are paid for by the owner. Units have laminate flooring, vertical blinds, ceiling fan, new fridge and microwave, queen sized bed, and are freshly painted. Common area kitchen is located on each floor and is available for everybody to use.

Well served by public transportation: Walk 2 minutes to Soto light rail station straight to Arts District, Little Tokyo, or no time to catch a bus to DTLA. It is incredibly easy to get around this town!

Approval is based on income (must show proof of income at least twice the monthly rent), rental history, criminal background (no felonies), & NO evictions. Credit scores are not as important as these other factors in evaluating applications. Please apply today!

Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does! Please go to our web-site www.dtlarealestate.com and submit your information on the Quick Contact Form or call/text now! And don't forget to follow us on social media at the links below, thank you!

Instagram/Youtube/Snapchat/Tiktok/Tumblr/Pinterest/Linkedin: @dtlarealestate

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1101-- 24/7 Creative Office Space in DTLA***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Post Title: 453 S Spring St #222 - BEAUTIFUL CORNER Creative Office Space
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

SPACE WILL HAVE NEW LIGHTING! (not shown in photos)

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Cafe 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting.

This space has ONE HUGE ROOM plus 1 PRIVATE OFFICE, the bosses office per se :) This space is a CORNER UNIT facing 5th Street and has tons of WINDOWS flooding the space with NATURAL LIGHT! Custom curtains included! The unit also has a LARGE STORAGE CLOSET with shelving. Space will have FRESH WHITE PAINT! Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR LEASE ARE ACCEPTED ONLY, and owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Post Title: **Promenade Plaza! 716 W 1st ! ~F~A~N~T~A~S~T~I~C~RETAIL/OFFICE!**
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This space is bank space/credit union space. DTLA RETAIL/OFFICE/MEDICAL SPACE for lease in the busy and well-known PROMENADE PLAZA! This property is located on the CORNER OF 1ST/HOPE ST right across the street from the DWP Building, Disney Hall, Music Center, and a block away from the mega Frank Gehry development that will soon be completed! This property is also a short walk to the soon to be completed new subway station! The property is a residential condo building upstairs known as the Promenade Towers and the retail below where the space is available is known again as the Promenade Plaza. Share the plaza with a great tenant mix including a Subway, a yoga studio, a cafe, an acupuncture & herbal medicine office, a nail salon, a physical therapist and two restaurants! Unit 716 is a CORNER SPACE and has immediate visibility from the elevator from the parking garage. As a corner space it gets natural light from two sides, and the unit has TONS OF WINDOWED FRONTAGE that could be used as advertising space. It features it's on spot for signage and tons of outdoor seating available in the plaza. This space was previously occupied by a CREDIT UNION so it's basically built out like a BANK SPACE. The photos show the space as it is presently. Another bank would be an excellent fit, but ANY PERMITTED USE IS POSSIBLE! Per negotiation, landlord can deliver the space as an empty blank shell for a tenant wishing to use the space for a different use, such as medical office, dental office, and more. For well tenants who are well established and have excellent finances, landlord can, per negotiation, contribute to tenant improvements, aside from a basic demo. It's also possible to subdivide the space into two units roughly 1100sf and 2000sf each. The space currently has central HVAC, 2 private bathrooms, a server room, a lunch room, a teller station area, and a huge open area with divisions for desks. Retail tenants have 24/7 access to the space and plaza. There’s a parking garage for the building as well where people can park for a daily fee of $10 of $200 monthly. It is also possible for retail tenants to validate their customers parking as well! Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 453 Spring # 801-Spring Arts Tower: Small Creative Office 24/7 Access!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! Post Title: 453 Spring #201 - Incredibly Cool Creative Space!7 offices, conf rm+++
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Spring St Cafe), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access.

THIS IS THE COOLEST & MOST UNIQUE SPACE IN THE BUILDING! And the biggest, for that matter. Space has POLISHED CEMENT FLOORS along with GORGEOUS WINDOWS. The space is a CORNER UNIT and the CONFERENCE ROOM (yes there is one) is in the corner. Incredible picture frame wall and column molding give this space a historic, elegant look, and the raw brick and glass office walls lend itself to a HIGH TECH FEELING ENVIRONMENT. There's AMAZING SKYLIGHTS that were discovered during renovation. There's 7 PRIVATE OFFICES! Reception area as well. Photos speak for themselves! GREAT NATURAL LIGHT! There is a HIDDEN SPEAK-EASY BAR/LUNCHROOM in the space as well, and it's complete with a kitchen, full bar, and refrigerator! The bookshelf is a secret door! Last but not least, there's a HUGE MEDIA ROOM as well along with an additional private room in there.

Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 525 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceiling! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Post Title: 523 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceilngs! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Close to the Freeways, Long Beach, Wilmington, Terminal Island, the Queen Mary, the Waterfront Park, and more. Post Title: Flexible Office Spaces for Rent
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

CENTRL Office offers elegantly designed offices, desks, and meeting rooms that can be booked by the day, month, or year.

CENTRL Los Angeles is located in the heart of Little Tokyo, steps away from locally-owned cafes, bars, restaurants, and public transit.

All workspace rentals include access to premium business amenities including high-speed wifi internet, printers/copiers, common areas, kitchens, on-site office managers, and professional cleaning services.

OFFICES
(starting at $1,000 a month)
A lockable and move-in ready space you can call your own, our fully furnished offices can be rented for one person or teams up to 12 people.

DESKS
(starting at $400 a month)
Our dedicated desks are located in a shared workroom with a lockable door and include 24/7 building access.

TABLES
(starting $195 a month)
Work at one of our common area tables and enjoy all of our business amenities as well as our common areas, kitchens, phone booths, and more.

ROOMS
(from $35 an hour)
Our meeting rooms can hold up to 10 people and come with TVs, whiteboards, speaker phones, and super fast wireless internet.

SUITES
(starting at $5,000 a month)
A private, lockable workspace that includes a combination of offices, desks, and rooms for teams up to 40 people.

MAILBOXES
(from $75 a month)
Get a professional business address that you can use to receive mail and packages. All business mailbox rentals come with onsite support.

Call Carmen: 213-536-7866
Learn more: www.CENTRLOffice.com/california-los-angeles-downtown

Post Title: ***453 S Spring #1114-- Small Creative Work Space with 24/7 Access***
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! Post Title: **Promenade Plaza! 716 W 1st ! ~F~A~N~T~A~S~T~I~C~RETAIL/OFFICE!**
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

This space is bank space/credit union space. DTLA RETAIL/OFFICE/MEDICAL SPACE for lease in the busy and well-known PROMENADE PLAZA! This property is located on the CORNER OF 1ST/HOPE ST right across the street from the DWP Building, Disney Hall, Music Center, and a block away from the mega Frank Gehry development that will soon be completed! This property is also a short walk to the soon to be completed new subway station! The property is a residential condo building upstairs known as the Promenade Towers and the retail below where the space is available is known again as the Promenade Plaza. Share the plaza with a great tenant mix including a Subway, a yoga studio, a cafe, an acupuncture & herbal medicine office, a nail salon, a physical therapist and two restaurants! Unit 716 is a CORNER SPACE and has immediate visibility from the elevator from the parking garage. As a corner space it gets natural light from two sides, and the unit has TONS OF WINDOWED FRONTAGE that could be used as advertising space. It features it's on spot for signage and tons of outdoor seating available in the plaza. This space was previously occupied by a CREDIT UNION so it's basically built out like a BANK SPACE. The photos show the space as it is presently. Another bank would be an excellent fit, but ANY PERMITTED USE IS POSSIBLE! Per negotiation, landlord can deliver the space as an empty blank shell for a tenant wishing to use the space for a different use, such as medical office, dental office, and more. For well tenants who are well established and have excellent finances, landlord can, per negotiation, contribute to tenant improvements, aside from a basic demo. It's also possible to subdivide the space into two units roughly 1100sf and 2000sf each. The space currently has central HVAC, 2 private bathrooms, a server room, a lunch room, a teller station area, and a huge open area with divisions for desks. Retail tenants have 24/7 access to the space and plaza. There’s a parking garage for the building as well where people can park for a daily fee of $10 of $200 monthly. It is also possible for retail tenants to validate their customers parking as well! Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 453 Spring #1029- 24/7 Access Creative Office Space in DTLA!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Post Title: 453 Spring #201 - Incredibly Cool Creative Space!7 offices, conf rm+++
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA's Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There's also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a cafe on the 9th floor (Spring St Cafe), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There's also on-site management and maintenance. There's shared mens, womens, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access.

THIS IS THE COOLEST & MOST UNIQUE SPACE IN THE BUILDING! And the biggest, for that matter. Space has POLISHED CEMENT FLOORS along with GORGEOUS WINDOWS. The space is a CORNER UNIT and the CONFERENCE ROOM (yes there is one) is in the corner. Incredible picture frame wall and column molding give this space a historic, elegant look, and the raw brick and glass office walls lend itself to a HIGH TECH FEELING ENVIRONMENT. There's AMAZING SKYLIGHTS that were discovered during renovation. There's 7 PRIVATE OFFICES! Reception area as well. Photos speak for themselves! GREAT NATURAL LIGHT! There is a HIDDEN SPEAK-EASY BAR/LUNCHROOM in the space as well, and it's complete with a kitchen, full bar, and refrigerator! The bookshelf is a secret door! Last but not least, there's a HUGE MEDIA ROOM as well along with an additional private room in there.

Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. Ask me the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: 525 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceiling! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Get it before it’s gone! Ask us the advantages of signing a five-year lease! Post Title: DTLA: Santee Passage GRND FLR Commercial Space with Kitchenette!
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Beautiful ground floor space available FOR LEASE! This property is located in DTLA’s Fashion District in the famous Santee Passage (aka as Santee Court). So basically this space is behind the building on Los Angeles St in the courtyard, and this courtyard is where Santee St starts. There’s tons and tons of residents upstairs in multiple buildings! This is arguably the best area of the Fashion District and definitely the biggest residential hub in the Fashion District. 9th St and Los Angeles St is probably the most desirable area for showrooms as the Cooper Building is located there. This space is situated on Los Angeles St between 7th St and 8th St, and the Historic Core District, and all the amenities of the Historic Core, is only a few blocks away! So! Anyway this space is accessible from the side walk at the front end off Los Angeles St, shown in the photos. At this entrance there’s a food court and at the end of the passage a minim-mart. The other access point is from Santee Street. This space features windowed frontage, a front reception area, a conference room/office, a back open area with kitchenette, and a back private office. There’s also a storage closest. There’s built in desks that can be kept or removed, per negotiation. Excellent space with exposed ceilings, central HVAC, 24/7 access, great natural light, stylish glass walls, and more. This space shares a common area set of bathrooms on the second floor upstairs. Post Title: 523 S Broadway! DTLA GRND FLR SPACE+BASEMNT! High Ceilngs! Central A/C
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

BROADWAY! The most up and coming street in DTLA! Area has a tremendous amount of character and creativity to it. You want your thoughts provoked on a block, this will do it! Location is very popular by millennials and young professionals. This building is also across the street from the ROXIE, CAMEO, & ARCADE THEATERS! These are just three of the many historic theaters on Broadway! Broadway was the original Hollywood and stars like Charlie Chaplin strolled down these sidewalks. The Spring Arcade FOOD HALL is also located across the street. Incredible amounts of resources are being invested into this area from the Bringing Back Broadway organization. Only signage allowed on Broadway is now NEON!

GROUND FLOOR: Has SOARING CEILINGS! There's CENTRAL HVAC along with WINDOWED FRONTAGE and a metal roll-up door for security. Space also has a back door to the alley, great for loading/unloading. Space can be used for any kind of permitted RETAIL SPACE or OFFICE SPACE. Space is IDEAL FOR AN ART GALLERY! Other great uses might be an barber shop, insurance agency, beauty salon, spa, clothing store, and more! Space has PRIVATE BATHROOM! There's also 3 OFFICES in the back! Smooth ceilings!

BASEMENT: Basement is accessed through stairs in the ground floor space. It has raw brick walls, exposed wood ceilings, and cement flooring along with basic lighting. Technically, it can only be used for storage since there's only one staircase and it doesn't have an elevator. Doesn't have HVAC at the moment.

Post Title: **453 Spring St #321-DTLA: Creative Office Space **
Description:
QR Code Link to This Post

Incredible 12-story creative office building located on Gallery Row, in Downtown LA’s Old Bank District, technically in the Historic Core. This building was originally home to the Crocker Bank and is positioned on Spring Street, the most popular street for creative types in DTLA, numbers-wise. This area is brimming with creative activity. Nearly countless bars, restaurants, and cafes dot the map nearby along with the post office across the street. The DTLA Art Walk (2nd Thursday of every month) occurs here on Spring Street, largely between 4th-8th Streets. The world famous night club The Exchange is a block away. This building is home to artists, fashion designers, attorneys, accountants, media, marketing/PR, and many more. There’s also a hair salon and yoga studio in the building. Excellent amenities including a café on the 9th floor (Café 9), an incredibly beautiful bar made out of a bank vault in the basement (the Crocker Club), and a large conference room available on the third floor that is free for tenants to reserve. All white walls, and natural light. The building has 24/7 access and 24/7 on-site security. There’s also on-site management and maintenance. There’s shared men’s, women’s, and handicap restrooms on every floor along with a freight elevator with alley access. The majority of the units have exposed ceilings, polished cement floors, large windows flooding the space with light, and track lighting. Per negotiation, Landlord can modify and improve the spaces to meet your needs. On all our listings MINIMAL ONE YEAR leases are accepted only! Owner may require a longer than one-year lease for this listing. If available, ask about the advantages of signing a 3 YEAR LEASE! Showings by APPOINTMENT ONLY! We are a real estate brokerage, if this space doesn’t meet your needs we may have or know about something else that does!
